abstract: Lash-Voynich Project, symphony composition collaboration between New Haven Symphony Orchestra composer and music director Hannah Lash and William Boughton, will open up composing process to online commentary; composers hope approach will result in larger life for project (Metropolitan/Connecticut).
lead_paragraph: As Hannah Lash, the New Haven Symphony Orchestra’s new composer-in-residence, writes her first symphony, she will be shining a light on the work in progress, inviting comment on social media and in live forums.

headline.main: A Composer Opens Up Her Creative Process, Online
headline.print_headline: Opening Up the Creative Process, Online

snippet: As Hannah Lash, the New Haven Symphony Orchestra’s new composer-in-residence, writes her first symphony, she will be shining a light on the work in progress, inviting comment on social media and in live forums.
